cleaned_text: This slideset edited by Professors Esposito, Palmu, De Wals and Sanders for the Second WAidid Congress present some studies that compare in different countries (including Finland, Sweden, Quebec and the Netherlands) efficacy differences between PCV10 and PCV13. To learn
